title: Add typing/backspace word animation to Home hero headline span

requirements.text: Update ONLY the selected Home page hero headline span element (XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h1[1]/span[1]`, implemented in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`) to animate its text with a typing effect that cycles through the words `Planning` → `Precision` → `Performance`, deleting each complete word with a backspace effect before typing the next, and repeating this loop continuously. Do not change the span’s existing font, size, Tailwind classes, or color styling.

quotes: i want to animate this part as Typing Planning then delete the complete word using backspace then type Precision then again delete the word and finally type Performance and then repeat it again from start
yes and dont change font or color

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the selected `<span>` in the hero `<h1>` displays a typing animation for the word "Planning", then deletes the full word via a backspace effect, then types "Precision", deletes it, then types "Performance", deletes it, and repeats from "Planning" indefinitely.
Only the selected span’s text content/behavior is changed; its existing Tailwind class(es) (including its color class) remain unchanged and the visual font/color do not change.
The animation runs smoothly on both desktop and mobile and does not cause layout breakage or clipping in the hero headline.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected element at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h1[1]/span[1]` in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
Do not change the selected span’s existing font or color (do not alter its Tailwind classes or introduce styling changes).
Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other `frontend.immutablePaths`.
nonGoals: Adding email-sending for contact form enquiries (not supported in this build request).
Changing any other Home page hero copy besides the selected span.
Redesigning the hero section layout or changing typography/color scheme.
